document.heading: Settlement Payment Integrity Amendment Act of 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-319, the “Settlement Payment Integrity Amendment Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-899, which was referred to the Committee on Public Safety and the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 9, 2010, and November 23, 2010, respectively. Enacted without signature of the Mayor on December 16, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-640 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-319 became effective on March 12, 2011.
